title: Sailor Moon - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 13 (Pt. 3)
description:
Tim tries to bring the boys up-to-speed on the awesomeness that is Sailor Moon.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Want the whole show early?
Buy the MP3 version of the show on Band Camp: http://gameovergreggy.bandcamp.com

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Each and every Monday, Greg, Colin, Nick, and Tim get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Jim - http://www.twitter.com/JimReilly
